name: OSHA Compliant Shelters
description: Improves shelters in various ways:<LINE><LINE>- The door only closes when you hold DOWN or JUMP to sleep.<LINE>- You don't need to leave the shelter before sleeping again.<LINE>- Items never get trapped in the shelter door.<LINE>- Invading creatures are shoved outside while the door is closing.<LINE>- Excess amounts of items like fruit aren't destroyed by default.<LINE>- Item, creature, and player positions are saved.<LINE><LINE>Configurable. Art by @liszhuk, code at github.com/Dual-Iron/osha-compliant-shelters
